mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.nick_name AS "nickName", a.hotel_id AS "hotelId", a.id_num AS "idNum", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.home_address AS "homeAddress", a.phone AS "phone", a.emergency_contact AS "emergencyContact", a.emergency_contact_phone AS "emergency_contactPhone", a.member_num AS "memberNum", a.menber_level_id AS "menberLevelId", a.user_id AS "userId", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, nick_name, hotel_id, id_num, birthday, home_address, phone, emergency_contact, emergency_contact_phone, member_num, menber_level_id, user_id, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{nickName}, #{hotelId}, #{idNum}, #{birthday}, #{homeAddress}, #{phone}, #{emergencyContact}, #{emergency_contactPhone}, #{memberNum}, #{menberLevelId}, #{userId}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, nick_name = #{nickName}, hotel_id = #{hotelId}, id_num = #{idNum}, birthday = #{birthday}, home_address = #{homeAddress}, phone = #{phone}, emergency_contact = #{emergencyContact}, emergency_contact_phone = #{emergency_contactPhone}, member_num = #{memberNum}, menber_level_id = #{menberLevelId}, user_id = #{userId}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
